original_text: Then the city's leaders sent a message to Jezebel. They told her, ‘The people have killed Naboth with stones.’
korean_text: 이세벨에게 통보하기를 나봇이 돌에 맞아 죽었나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Then the city's leaders sent a message to Jezebel
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 성 지도자들은 이세벨에게 메시지를 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: The people have killed Naboth with stones
